welcome_message_body: Welcome to Naga City, the heart of Bicolandia! Get ready to experience the city's rich history, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Naga has to offer.

restaurants.name: White Bean Café
restaurants.description: White Bean Café is a italian restaurant located in Naga City.
restaurants.address: Naga Land Hotel (Elias Angeles St.), 4400 Naga City
